description: Content promoting hatred or discrimination against protected groups based on race
examples: Racial slurs or derogatory terms; Claims of racial superiority; Calls for segregation or exclusion

description: Content promoting hatred or discrimination against protected groups based on religion
examples: Attacks on religious groups; Calls for violence against religious communities; Dehumanizing religious stereotypes

description: Content promoting hatred or discrimination against protected groups based on gender or sexual orientation
examples: Misgendering with malicious intent; Slurs targeting sexual orientation; Promoting conversion therapy

description: Content targeting individuals to intimidate, threaten, or humiliate through direct attacks
examples: Personal insults directed at an individual; Repeated negative mentions of someone; Creating content to mock a specific person

description: Publishing private information to enable harassment
examples: Sharing home addresses; Publishing phone numbers; Revealing workplace information

description: Organized campaigns targeting individuals
examples: Organizing pile-ons against users; Creating harassment campaigns; Mass reporting to silence users

description: Content promoting, glorifying, or threatening violence through direct threats
examples: Threatening physical harm to an individual; Death threats; Threatening violence against groups

description: Content calling for or encouraging violent acts
examples: Calling for attacks on people; Promoting violent riots; Encouraging self-harm in others

description: Content celebrating or praising violent acts
examples: Celebrating violent attacks; Praising mass shooters; Promoting terrorism

description: False health information with potential to cause physical harm
examples: False vaccine claims; Dangerous medical advice; Promoting unproven treatments as cures

description: False information about elections and voting
examples: False voting dates or locations; Claiming election fraud without evidence; Discouraging legitimate voting

description: False information during emergencies or disasters
examples: False emergency alerts; Misinformation during disasters; Fake charity scams

description: Sexually explicit or inappropriate material
examples: Pornographic images or videos; Explicit sexual descriptions; Sexual content in non-adult spaces

description: Intimate imagery shared without consent
examples: Revenge porn; Leaked intimate content; Deepfake pornography

description: Any sexual content involving minors - highest priority violation
examples: Any sexual content involving minors; Sexualized images of children; Grooming behavior

description: Inauthentic or manipulative content through repetitive posting
examples: Repetitive identical messages; Automated posting bots; Comment flooding

description: Fraudulent schemes to deceive users
examples: Fake giveaways; Phishing attempts; Cryptocurrency scams

description: Pretending to be someone else to deceive users
